section_title: Fourth review of the financial mechanism
sentences: Parties discussed the heavily bracketed text for a draft decision on the fourth review, which was compiled at SBI 28.

Developed countries generally expressed their satisfaction with the GEF s performance, while developing countries had numerous concerns, particularly with regard to the GEF s fifth replenishment, complementarity of the financial mechanism to other sources of financing, proliferation of funds outside of the Convention and outcomes of the mid-term review of the Resource Allocation Framework (RAF).
A short compromise text was eventually agreed, and on 10 December the SBI adopted conclusions and forwarded a draft decision to the COP for its consideration.
The COP adopted the decision on 12 December.
